text: Patrícia Gabancho Ghielmetti (29 September 1952 - 28 November 2017) was an Argentine-born Spanish journalist and author. She was born in Buenos Aires. Her work and personal life were based in Barcelona, Spain. She wrote books on the history of Catalonia, the city life in Barcelona and on Tango. ==Death== Gabancho died on 28 November 2017 in Barcelona of lung cancer at the age of 65.Muere la periodista y escritora Patricia Gabancho ==Works== * Crònica de la independència * El Besòs. El riu que mirava passar els trens * El segle XX vist per les àvies, con Gemma Aixelà * Despert entre adormits * Carta a la societat catalana sobre l'immigració * La postguerra cultural a Barcelona (1939-1959) * Cultura rima amb confitura * La batalla de l'Estatut * El fil secret de la història * A la intempèrie ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Argentine journalists Category:People from Barcelona Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Spanish journalists
title: Patrícia Gabancho
